description:
Stranger Things is going to be around for at least another season. In a new interview with Vulture, the Duffer brothers confirmed that their Netflix breakout hit is coming back for season three, with a fourth season also looking pretty likely. 热播美剧《怪奇物语》至少会有三季。该剧制片人杜夫兄弟在接受娱乐杂志Vulture访问时，确认了这部奈飞口碑热剧已经续订了第三季，接下来也很有可能继续第四季。

Though they're characteristically tight-lipped about what's coming in season two, Ross Duffer did share that they "wanted to push things a bit," in the new run. 虽然他们仍旧对新剧集闭口不言，但罗斯·杜夫表示，他们在新的一季中“想向前推动剧情发展。”

 "'I don't want to call it season two, I just want it to feel like a movie sequel.' If you have a successful movie, No. 2 is always a little bit bigger." “我不想把它称作第二季，我想要电影续集的感觉。一部成功电影的续集总是要宏大一些。

As for their overall plan for the show, "we're thinking it will be a four-season thing and then out." 至于这部剧的整体计划，我们打算拍四季再结束。”
While 2017 has been the year in which Netflix finally started canceling some of its enormous roster of shows—Sense8—there's basically no chance at all that Stranger Things will end before its creators want it to. 2017年，虽然奈飞公司砍掉了大量例如《超感猎杀》这样的美剧，但《怪奇物语》这部剧，在编剧不想再创作之前，应该不太可能结束。
So although season three is all that's been officially picked up, you can pretty much rely on season four dropping sometime in fall of 2019. 所以即使只有第三季正式预定了，你还是可以待着期待在2019年见到第四季的。  

（翻译：红楼里的小石头）
